view my projects

Creating attractive, easy to use websites is a love of mine. In addition to graphic and web design, I have a passion for web development. I love figuring out how things work, and there is no better feeling than when I have solved a coding problem. When I'm not behind a computer screen, you can find me with my nose in a book, spending time with our canine friends, or baking a bunch of goodies in the kitchen.

Thank you for stopping by,
Connie Tan
